content: Mike Essig,great write and you have touched upon a topic which is an open secret but nobody wants to talk about it.Writing is a very painful activity and is a labor of love with steep valleys and very few mountains in between.First step in writing is always building “reputation” as a writer and “money” only comes after that. Some might argue that ,few writers made it big very fast,but those few can be counted by the fingers of the hand.Rest all have struggled and worked off their asses in this remarkably creative cutthroat field.
